name: conic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in the shape of a cone: Their tents are conic in shape. The missile has a conic warhead. Synonym
conical
mathematics
  specialized relating to cones or being part of a cone: Conic geometry is very important in astronomy. In this graph an elliptical conic form is generated.
More examplesFewer examplesThis conic wall light is shaped from fused glass, sandblasted to a silky finish.An inverse-square force entails a conic orbit.

short for conic section: a curve formed by a plane (= a flat surface) cutting through a cone: The comet traced a conic. Projective geometry is based in the study of conics.
More examplesFewer examplesMany mathematicians including Isaac Newton have contributed to the study of conics.
